website_summaries.verdict: With its mission oak finish and gleaming hardware, this practical storage trunk doubles as a table, adding a touch of rustic charm to any room.
pros: Sturdy construction and supports up to 180 lbs
many users find it ideal for linens or toys
Despite capacity, it has a relatively small footprint
Fits even in smaller living rooms
Goes with many different styles of decor
cons: At 61 lbs., the trunk is somewhat heavy and not designed to provide portable storage
Several users found assembly to be time-consuming

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage trunk, but infuriating to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews--it was the hardest piece of furniture I ever had to assemble! I'm a 61-year old woman and I did it all by myself in limited space with my fur babies crawling all over, but I should have had a helper. One person did mention about the instructions not designating the left and right sides very clearly. I discovered that after I had it all assembled (after a lot of...shall I say, angry outbursts!) But I just used my power drill and made new holes. It's together, but it doesn't look like a tight fit, but it'll do. It looks great and it is huge! The instructions are only diagrams, no text or explanations/descriptions.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy C. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great look but not to be assembled solo
customer_reviews.text: This unit must be assembled gingerly. What I mean is the average American man may use too much torque on scissor hinges. When screwing to the top I almost made a hole in the wood by going through. The engineers may need to adjust the screw siZe for that aspect. There was also lots of fibrous residue. Along with that is a string varnish smell. My concern was the Prop 65 warning and what they loose debris could cause. If they could address this I think this would be a good piece considering self assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Andy J

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this chest that also doubles as our coffee table. It is great for storage which is so desperately needed in our apartment. The red oak is a beautiful color, I was afraid it might be too orangey or red but it is perfect. It looks expensive. The lid stays put when opened at any angle which is great. Took my husband 30 minutes to put together. We love it, would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: I like the way it looks and the fact that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks and the fact that it is not a big gawky looking table but my husband did not like putting it together. One hole was in the wrong place and another was stripped and now loose but for the price I think it is good. You get what you pay for. I could go to a furniture store and get one all put together and pay $500 so to me it was worth it. But don't ask my husband's opinion.
customer_reviews.author: barbwire

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, solid, and hold a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have the coffee table trunk and the end table trunk both, purchased to replace a regular end table and coffee table which were getting unsteady as the screws loosened (10 years or so). Very attractive, and holds a lot of stuff which is why I bought them. Solid and very steady. They are furniture designed to act as trunks, but the legs on the bottom and their weight make them clearly in the furniture category and not the luggage category.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Sugarbean

customer_reviews.title: IT IS RED NOT OAK
customer_reviews.text: IT IS RED NOT OAK!!! Don't let the picture or other reviews fool you, this trunk is RED. I would return it but the seller has such a ridiculous return policy w/ so many fees it's not worth it to return. Very disappointed. If you like the ugly faux red wood, it wasn't too difficult to assemble and will hold extra quilts in my basement but I'm purchasing an actual OAK colored table for my living room. Again, VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for storing grandchild toys & safety lid is great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our living room . We have a 2 yr granddaughter with toys here . So rather than let them pile up in the corner , I decided to get this after we painted our living room & got a new rug . It matches my other mission style furniture. And once she grows up , I’ll be able to store my stuff in it . It’s deep & safety cover is great . Slow closing . She even likes to sit in it too
customer_reviews.author: Simply Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: (52-year-old female) Instructions were fine. Finished piece looks very good
customer_reviews.text: Took me 90 minutes to put it all together. (52-year-old female) Instructions were fine. Finished piece looks very good. Very, very sturdy. The inside is even a little better 'finished' than I would have expected. The only reason I can't give it 5 stars is the lid is not 100% aligned with the base, and the feet are not 100% aligned with the base. The holes lined up easily to assemble it, but the finished product is ever so slightly not lined up with itself. Probably no one will ever notice except the person who assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This end table is so much nicer than the price we paid. It was easy to put together.....although an extra set of hands may have made it easier during the final assembly. I absolutely love the style.....and the sturdiness feels like a much more expensive piece of furniture. The outside pieces are heavy wood. The only manufactured wood.....that I could tell.......was the inside base. The color matched the online picture. I turned an area of my bedroom into a conversation area with this piece used for the beverage table....and I just love the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why some had difficulty assembling. If you can follow directions it's simple to put together. I put it two together by myself and extra set of hands would have helped as it suggests in the instructions but I still found it rather easy to assemble. It looks really nice for the money, it's reasonably well made, I'm very happy with my purchase. I have it mixed in with very expensive furniture and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: Put together myself
customer_reviews.text: I was determined to get this together all by myself. I did it fine except somehow mixed up the end pieces and did not have holes for the hinge. Thankfully I was able to screw the hinge in even without the holes so that I did not have to take it apart. It works great. We hide all the many blankets in there!! My whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than the picture
customer_reviews.text: The trunk is nice and has lots of storage room, but the color of the trunk is much darker than the "Mission Oak" color that is shown online and darker than we wanted. We have golden oak hardwood floors and wanted something that wouldn't contrast so much with them. We like the trunk, but are not too pleased with the dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Catmom

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The chest is very attractive -- however, I am disappointed that the color is so dark. I thought it would match my other tables better.. It was not easy to put together and the side fasteners aren't holding. We will have to glue them. Too bad I wanted to love it. I can't return it because husband already assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Bird

customer_reviews.title: The top will not close all the way, stays cracked open.
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit but the look is ruined by the top that will not stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: TAC

customer_reviews.title: semi-easy assembly; excellent final product
customer_reviews.text: It was a little challenging to construct alone, but I eventually got it together. The separate pieces are pretty heavy, and the finished product seems very sturdy, although I wouldn't put too much stress on the hinges. They're attached to the lid with two little screws on each side, and it wouldn't take much to snap the hinges right off the lid. To give an idea of the volume: The lid is heavy enough to hold down the 3 king-size pillows I have in there, but 4 was too many.
customer_reviews.author: R. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but had to assemble more than expected.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking, sturdy, end table...but....I was not expecting that it came TOTALLY UNASSEMBLED (definitely not "some assembly required")! So spent a lot of time I wasn't planning on putting in itty bitty screws and lining up hinges. I considered using a cordless drill, but was afraid it would set the screws too tight and/or I'd make mistakes and scratch something. Seems it could come packaged with the hardware already attached ~ but, I got thru it and that's that. Just a little (!!) more work and time than I was prepared for. Put it together yesterday - and it looks great - lots and lots of storage space - doesn't look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Riddell

customer_reviews.title: Pay close attention to the installation.
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy once it is put together. It did take me sometime to put together I made a mistake and had to redo a part all over again. This item is very nice and there is alot of storage.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: very nice piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall, very nice piece of furniture for the price. It’s aesthetically pleasing and so far seems sturdy (I’ve had it 9 months so far). It holds a good amount of stuff inside and it was easy to assemble. My only complaint is that when putting it together, the “holes for the hardware/hinges” to attach the lid were not aligned properly so the lid was off center and hung over one side, while not covering the other. I ended up just aligning it where I wanted and made my own holes because I’d already put it together and didn’t want the hassle of taking it apart or exchanging it
customer_reviews.author: dejavu

customer_reviews.title: Dorset Oak Trunk Cocktail Table
customer_reviews.text: Received the trunk in perfect condition in record time. Husband was able to assemble it with no problems - took about an hour. He said instructions were easy to follow. It's a great looking chest and will hold a lot. We're using it for a coffee table. Good quality and it looks like it should have cost more! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nance McD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: More red colored than the photo shows, but I love it. The lid does not line up perfectly, this could be fixed by re-drilling holes if you have the tools, but it operates flawlessly. It is heavy and the metal pieces are pretty good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Log Cabin Ranch

customer_reviews.title: As good as the other reviewers say it is
customer_reviews.text: Given its cost and the fact that is comes flat packed, this is a surprisingly sturdy and well made trunk. You can believe the other reviews that talk about how nice it looks and how well made it is. The only suggestion I would make is to buy a bottle of wood glue and use it when assembling the trunk. I did, and now this trunk is VERY Solid.
customer_reviews.author: Camp4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Loved this end table so much - I went back ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this end table so much - I went back and ordered a second one. My hubby and I are in our 60's and we put it together ourselves. The pieces were marked well, but they were a little heavy. Once it was put together though, it was a great piece! Looked even better than the picture and I was really pleased we bought them. Picture is really very close to the actual color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. It comes in 5 pieces, plus the legs, and it took me about an hour to assemble. The instructions were great, it was not at all difficult to put together. It is sturdy and heavier than I expected, which I was glad about because it seems like it will last forever. The photo is true to color. It is gorgeous and much more interesting to look at than a regular table. A classy piece, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dhawan

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Needs 2 people to put together. Not very sturdy. You will need to add hardware to make solid. Not worth the price
customer_reviews.author: L REILLY

customer_reviews.title: Great little side table with storage!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived to me in perfect condition, no scratches, marks or missing parts. It was fairly simple to put together but I also used some wood glue to make it stronger (some other reviewers recommended to do this). It is a very attractive, sturdy and avrich looking piece. I am very happy with my purchase and the seller! I bought the matching coffee table too and I love them both!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Lovely wood & fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: Unique storage/spacious coffee table. Had trouble finding someone to assemble. All the pieces were well marked & direction looked detailed.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY J ELLINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Nice end table
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Not hard to put together. Had a little smell but went away over time. Wish they were a little bigger but works for what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miranda

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted. Great price too. Love the red tones in the color. Relatively easy to put together, just time consuming. Having a partner will help. Perfect for a house without a lot of built in storage. Despite not being real wood, it's very solid. I'm not sure about other reviews saying it couldn't be put together as directed and needed wood glue because we had zero problems with two of these and the matching coffee table. If pieces aren't fitting something's wrong because there's no reason they shouldn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: be very careful how you proceed as the it does not come assembled and you need to sets of hands and it is sturdy. once assembled
customer_reviews.text: assembly instructions were not very clear, and unless you have done this before, be very careful how you proceed as the it does not come assembled and you need to sets of hands and it is sturdy. once assembled, it is a very nice piece (a bit larger and heavier than I had imagined). but still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Nicer and more spacious than expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an end table next to a sleeper sofa to use as storage for the pillows and blankets. The queen size comforter and 2 pillows fit with room to spare! The table came without the assembly instructions, but an email requesting them was promptly answered with the instructions attached. Be sure that there are two patient people available to put this together. There is one step in the assembly that absolutely requires at least 4 hands! Didn't take long to put together, however.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well packed.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the first one back because the lid was much lighter in color than the sides. Didn't match at all. The second one arrived in perfect shape and was easy to assemble. I bought the 3 pieces; cocktail trunk, end table and side table. The trunk and side table color match perfectly. The end table trunk is lighter in color, not horribly so but enough to be noticed so if you are buying all three pieces don't be surprised if they don't match. Probably from different lots or manufacturing plants. Amazon service was very good.
customer_reviews.author: JBHaas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for two nite stands to fit beside the bed. These worked perfectly. Very nice wood and solid hardware. Very easy to put together. All the hardware only screws in one way into the pre-drilled holes so you can't make a mistake. Very well built and heavy. Nice storage option. The only thing i would do after you put them together is to allow to store in an un-used room or garage to air out for a couple of days prior to putting them to use, because the stain smell is pretty strong... Love em!
customer_reviews.author: BodybyGym

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend purchasing. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The trunk is very cheap. Putting it together was a nightmare. I ordered two. The pieces did not fit together on the first trunk because the pre-drilled holes didn't line up. The second trunk fit together, however, the round piece that you fit the screw into popped out of the backside of the trunk. The pre-drilled hole was drilled too deeply. I wouldn't recommend purchasing. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Dailey

customer_reviews.title: watch out for dinosaur roaches
customer_reviews.text: Smells so badly. Hard to put together. Dinasaur roaches came out of box. horrible
customer_reviews.author: angela naso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chest
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, maybe just a little bit darker. Wasn't too bad to put together. I've done a lot of these assemblies and this one was about average in difficulty and took about 2 hours. Holds a lot of blankets, and looks great in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: SeaShells

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sturdy end table!
customer_reviews.text: This end table feels sturdy and is as heavy as solid wood, but it's compressed particle board and my husband was able to put it together in about 15 minutes. It's very dense/thick so that it looks and feels like solid wood and had me fooled, and I love solid wood pieces. We have it in our office/library and it is larger than I expected, which was a nice surprise. The storage will hold both a throw and pillow for our reading chair when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: HJR

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this chest so much. Color matches my dining room set perfectly. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Viscardi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy table
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy table. It hold severals throw blankets and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: The table looks great! I read through the instructions
customer_reviews.text: The table looks great! I read through the instructions, made sure I had all the screws, bolts and tools. It took me a little over an hour to assemble alone. All screw holes lined up, the instruction were clear and the entire unit is in alignment. Very heavy pieces, and I would suggest you use the box it came in to cushion the pieces to avoid scratches. I love the way it looks and it will double as a quilt storage unit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Solid table/trunk
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking trunk and solidly made. The directions are very easy to follow, although I did find it much easier to assemble with my small drill. The outer hinges for the top did not line up to the holes and if I had followed them at all the top would have sat uneven. For that I just drilled my own holes (another benefit of having the drill).
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of furniture for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of furniture for the price. Im not sure how long the finish will last, but for now the color is very rich. It was fairly easy to put together. I did it by myself in an hour. The hardest part was pulling the heavy box into the house. The brackets on the inside are very sturdy and the exterior hardware is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Bonus!!
customer_reviews.text: I cant express how shocked I am at how fast I received this product. It came within 36 hrs of being ordered and I don't even have Amazon Prime!! Putting it together was rather simple and took maybe a little over an hour. It matches my other furniture exactly and is roomier than I thought it would be...bonus!! Very happy with it and the price was good also.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette D

customer_reviews.title: The finished product is beautiful to look at and quite serviceable
customer_reviews.text: A lovely piece of furniture. It was more difficult to put together than assumed and took me half the day. If you have another pair of hands that would be more helpful. The finished product is beautiful to look at and quite serviceable. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: paula k

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly sturdy and nice looking. The hinges do seem cheap, but they work well. The wife assembled them without issue and the look better than I expected. Not heirloom quality, but we had glass tables and end tables and those were not going to be good with two toddlers banging around. Corners are kind of sharp, so we might need to guard those but overall happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor Fun

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I honestly was worried that this was going to be cheap after I received it as a package, but once I put it together I was very pleased because everything fit in place just right and it looks very good. Personally, I wish it was about three inches higher, but I will take it is as it is. It makes a good place to stash blankets and other linens near a futon in case guests stay over night.
customer_reviews.author: A. Savage

customer_reviews.title: I love this trunk
customer_reviews.text: I love this trunk. It is well-made, and looks great. Lots of room to stash stuff. The lid supports were a bit of a challenge to attach (the angle for turning screws is tough), but otherwise the trunk went together pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Olson

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: We didn't get the end table we wanted but received a trunk but were missing several screws. Thank goodness someone who knew carpentry put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K.

customer_reviews.title: Functionality and look.
customer_reviews.text: Love the chest but the alignment is off and some of the parts broke so I had to buy some replacements at home depot. But for the price i can't complain too much honestly. Wasn't too hard to put together either.
customer_reviews.author: Kare

customer_reviews.title: Love these tables
customer_reviews.text: We bought the coffee table and two end tables. First time I ever ordered furniture through amazon. They're fantastic. We store blankets in the end tables and toys in the coffee table. I love that they provide storage but look more modern than other trunk-style furniture.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Nice style. Rich color. Difficult to put together though and the back was damaged. I put it against my bed and it doesn’t show.
customer_reviews.author: mosnow

customer_reviews.title: Great deal . Beautiful piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with this purchase looks beautiful and it’s very sturdy perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Alfredobotello

customer_reviews.title: Really like the style for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really like the style for the price. Be careful though. Clearly fake wood and fads if left in the sun. If you are cheap like me and don't want to spend $500 on real wood end tables - then I recommend buying a $5 can of varnish and sealing the finish right away. It will keep it looking nice a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my livingroom. Simple enough to put together and decent quality. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lammer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece. Wonderful storage for board games I only use when grandchildren visit. The rest of the time it works wonderfully as a side table between two chairs in the family room. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of it
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it, but it arrived broken. Parts of it are made of cheap materials. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: consumer

customer_reviews.title: POS CHEAP HARDWARE - DONT BUY THIS CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth half the price... horribly made Chinese hardware breaks and is extremely inferior construction, don’t waste your money on this POS
customer_reviews.author: Greg W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a product that thinks about form AND function. It looks great, and holds a ton of the junk that would normally be on the floor. Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Well worth the reasonable price. I have already had 3 friends purchase the same one after seeing it.
customer_reviews.author: BigG

customer_reviews.title: Great piece.
customer_reviews.text: I love this end table but i knocked it one star because it did not come with directions and did not have pre-drilled holes for the handle. I even went onto the website that sells them and unfortunately you can only get the directions if you are an authorized seller. I'm thankful that I also bought the coffee table and the assembly is exactly the same! It looks great in my living room! I've gotten many compliments and I love that it gives extra storage!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: screws were a bit long for the hinges & almost ...
customer_reviews.text: screws were a bit long for the hinges & almost came thru lid, it has an 'outie' dimple on lid because of length of screws to hold hinges
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Vanier

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and functional piece
customer_reviews.text: Looooooove my purchase! Beautifully made, sturdy, easy to put together and lots of storage space. I am a fan. I ordered two pieces which were supposed to arrive between Nov 6th & Nov 12th, instead I received the items on Nov 3rd. What a great surprise! I put them together right away and they are already set up in my living room. Kudos to the company for such fast service. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Josette Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my new trunk/coffee table. Super easy to put together Lots of storage
customer_reviews.author: Marta Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Did not send any hardware called again and they sent the rest.we had to use our own screws etc there’s were cheap and did not fit properly.very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: love it. I use it as an end table in my living room and store extra blanckets in it for when it gets cold in the winter, and it has the rustic look that I like. Also a very durable product, easy to assemble. thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great..
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly. Took about 20 minutes to assemble. Looks great...definately worth every penny. Looks a lot more expensive of a product than what I paid for it. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: AlbertL

customer_reviews.title: great purchase for us!
customer_reviews.text: This little piece was exactly what we were looking for - seems to be well made, & I love the fact that the hinge inside causes the top to stay open --- you don't have to worry that it will come smashing down on your fingers as you reach in to get something! Assembly was no problem, & it was packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and spacious. Came with bad hinges.
customer_reviews.text: I love this trunk. However the hinges are so stiff they won't bend or work. How do I get new hinges? Other than the nonworking hinges it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene L.

customer_reviews.title: Have had better experiences with Amazon furniture before
customer_reviews.text: Looks OK but it wobbles, the pieces don't fit very well, and some of the screw holes were really hard to work. Have had better experiences with Amazon furniture before, and this was more expensive. Not particularly happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to store extra bedding in as well as a nightstand for our spare bedroom. This accomplishes both while looking presentable. It's not high-end furniture, but seems solid and well made. Assembly wasn't bad if you follow the directions. Took me about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Lauri

customer_reviews.title: They look nice and suit the purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the matching coffee table for living room with a sofa bed to have a handy place to store the pillows, sheets and bedding for the sofa bed. They look nice and suit the purpose. Only wish the handles on the side had a stop to prevent them from lifting all the way up which pinches your fingers. Not an issue if you don't move it often.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley K Thesman

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for extra storage for blankets, pillows, etc. for our living room which doubles as a guest room when I found the pyramid trunk coffee and end table. They are perfect! Very roomy and easy to put together. They are well worth the money! I would recommend to anyone who needs extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Lapin Grand-mère

customer_reviews.title: Good looking piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Loved how it looked. It is sturdier than expected. Heavy but well built. Would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice piece of furniture. Easy to put together. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: crittenberry

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect in my living-room, also got the coffee table to match. They are perfect easy to put together, did them both in about an hour, used gorilla glue to help hold them together, with grandkids I needed the extra security.
customer_reviews.author: jcthatsme4

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This chest is so beautiful. It looks amazing and had great space for storage. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good thing this was covered with free shipping - this is a very heavy item. I bought two because the space is vertical which fits my small apartment needs.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together even for an unhandy person like me
customer_reviews.author: deniece

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a coffee table and it's great. The only thing I changed was to leave the legs off to make it a little shorter. I just put felt pads on the bottom to protect my floor and to make it move around easily. It's nice and solid and is wonderful for storing things. If I had the room to use as an end table(s) I would.
customer_reviews.author: A Walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift they had requested something to store there throw blankets in. After much searching I chose this, it is a big hit they have gotten a lot of compliments on this item, it does double duty serves as blanket storage and as an end table.
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy trunk
customer_reviews.text: This trunk is beautiful, very sturdy and easy to assemble. I loved it so much that I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: auspr

customer_reviews.title: Nice furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece of furniture. We like it and it matches well with the side tables that were bought with it. It will take some time to put together. Be sure you have the correct sides on the base before attaching the feet!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect storage bin
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Looks like photo. Very nice in the bedroom. Use it for additional sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Mignon

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is working well. Looks nice holds a lot of stuff conveniently. Assembly was easy, although one predrilled hole did not line up right in a leg. No big deal, I just left it out. Good product for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Guidoman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, this is not super high quality but for the price I was pleasantly surprised. Nice solid piece. Looks great and performs well over time. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: whisslstop

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the trunk. It was not hard to put together. The only disappointment is the color. I would not describe the color as OAK. It is much darker with reddish tone to it. It is more like mahogany.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple but I also used wood glue to increase the strength because people sit on it when they come over. It is a little darker wood than the picture but that's what I was hoping for anyway. Good looking trunk. I'm using it as a coffee table and also to store blankets and pillows. The hinges are also good design, they are such that the lid goes down slowly the last 5 or so inches so no slammed fingers. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: saline

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I keep my quilting supplies in it. Good looking piece of furniture and easy to assemble. I like so much I bought two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Howard

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this furniture. Have used it every day for well over a year.
customer_reviews.author: beverly

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sturdy storage trunk.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking trunk. Liked so much I bought two. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Looks more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: A very nice trunk. Took about 30 minutes to put together by myself.i did not buy it to use as a table. I use it my bedroom to put things inside. Looks very nice in the bedroom. Highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: glad we purchased this end table !
customer_reviews.text: although it was more putting together than we anticipated...the result upon completion were great. Much larger than anticipated and nice looking finish on the exterior....the space for storage is great. would definitel purchase again. Delivery was prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S. Hopper

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this Stuff....
customer_reviews.text: Unless you want to pay way too much money. Put my shoes on it, everyone spilled on it. I can keep blankets and pillows in it. After almost 3 years, it is a great buy - just take care of your things and they will last.
customer_reviews.author: John D Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality locking nuts
customer_reviews.text: The locknuts were of very poor quality. With almost no pressure being applied they crumbled when tightening.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever!
customer_reviews.text: Easier to put together than most. When completed you couldn't tell that it didn't arrive assembled. Love the warm color hue. Looks much more expensive. The hardware is solid but do not attempt to lift the trunk using the side handles. You would have to drill holes through to the interior and get different screws that attached all the way through the side panels and were secured with a bolt in the interior. I always use glue when assembling a wood product since I never intend to disassemble the product...in this case the trunk. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Malibu Artist

customer_reviews.title: extra storage
customer_reviews.text: matches the other pieces we have....well constructed and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Megadon

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. It was easy to put together, and looks great. Didn't have to go the extra step of using glue like some users recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CF

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great end table.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the trunk, but they sent to many assembly parts and left some out. I had to have them send the correct parts. But the trunk is nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic looking item once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic looking item once assembled. Actually was not very difficult to put together. Looks great with many positive comments from guests.
customer_reviews.author: AD-BD

customer_reviews.title: nice looking trunk
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to hold my cable box since my tv is mounted on the wall (ran the cords threw the wall). Fairly easy to put together. Had a few scratches on the black metal pieces but no one can really notice.
customer_reviews.author: bostongg

customer_reviews.title: This end table does double duty for someone like me, who is always in need of more ...
customer_reviews.text: This end table does double duty for someone like me, who is always in need of more storage space. It looks good, and offers a good bit of space for storing those seldom used items that were taking up too much of my closet space. It took a little time to put together, but the instructions (with schematics) were very clear, and all the hardware was individually packaged and clearly labeled. I also purchased the matching coffee table. Between the two, I managed to clear most of the clutter from my closets, and they look great in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Theia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trunk coffee table. It holds a lot of stuff inside and it's very sturdy. The instructions were easy to follow and everything was labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: SEI Furniture Pyramid Storage Trunk, Coffee Table, Mission Oak
product_meta.description: Size:Coffee Table| Color:Mission OakHave you met the Pyramid Trunk Coffee Table? Let's get acquainted. You can store stuff in it and display stuff on it. After a long day, go ahead and prop your feet on it. The flat top makes a perfect spot for a pretty vase of tulips, a stack of magazines, or a cup of coffee. After all, it is a coffee table - an incredibly useful one. When you're not curled up on the couch with your favorite blanket, store it inside the deep trunk space. Constructed of MDF wood with pine veneer, this coffee table features a beautiful espresso finish. With its good looks and versatility, it's a coffee table you'll want to get to know. Assembly required. Tip: You can pair the coffee table with the matching Pyramid Trunk End Table for a complete set. About SEI (Southern Enterprises, Inc.) This item is manufactured by Southern Enterprises or SEI. Southern Enterprises is a wholesale furniture accessory company based in Dallas, Texas. Founded in 1976, SEI offers innovative designs, exceptional customer
feature_bullets: Attractive and practical trunk offers enclosed storage and safety hinges that prevent slamming
Unique trunk table provides convenient storage possibilities for the living room or bedroom
Chic furniture piece is made with Pine, MDF, pine veneer, and metal
Trunk-table combo weighs 61 pounds, supports 180 pounds overall and measures 38.75 inches wide x 21.25 inches deep x 18.75 inches high
